name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character. 

Recent Changes: 
- Crazy Rituals works better.
- Brace now triggers when ANY card is played.
- Resilience now gives 2 Artifact instead of 1.
- Struggle now always playable but ends your turn.
- Awakened Form fixed. Hopefully.
- Cheeky Tricks renamed to Deep Focus.
- Tucking Feathers now affected by Block modifiers.
- Awakened Form power text updated.
- Unplayable cards no longer give energy.
- Compatibility with Warrior mod.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
